translation: (1) Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
(4) And who brings out the pasture
(6) We will make you recite, [O Muḥammad], and you will not forget,

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ
translation: (7) Except what Allāh should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
(8) And We will ease you toward ease.[1907]
footnotes: [1907]- To the path of Allāh's religion, which is easy and natural, or toward Paradise, by giving opportunities for righteous deeds.

translation: (9) So remind, if the reminder should benefit;[1908]
footnotes: [1908]- i.e., wherever it will be heard and understood.

translation: (10) He who fears [Allāh] will be reminded.
(11) But the wretched one will avoid it –
(12) [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

translation: (14) He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
(15) And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
(16) But you prefer the worldly life,
(17) While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
(18) Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
(19) The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
